section.title: xn0mak.F
section.programlisting: 00001 *CMZ : 24/05/2000 14.26.39 by Federico Carminati 00002 *-- Author : 00003 PROGRAM xnmake 00004 ************************************************************************ 00005 * * 00006 * This program creates a direct access file containing cross * 00007 * sections and secondary neutrons energy distributions from * 00008 * and ENDF-6 file processed by the PREPRO94 suite of * 00009 * programs LINEAR, RECENT, SIGMA1, FIXUP /1/. The format of * 00010 * the file and the corresponding routines to read it are * 00011 * described in /2/. The description of the algorithms and * 00012 * formats of ENDF-6 files is contained in /3/. * 00013 * * 00014 * Latest update 31/5/96 * 00015 * Author: Federico Carminati CERN-LHC * 00016 * * 00017 * /1/ D.E.Cullen, The 1994 ENDF Pre-processing codes, IAEA-NDS-39 * 00018 * * 00019 * /2/ F.Carminati, EET Code Collection, User Guide * 00020 * * 00021 * /3/ P.F.Rose, C.L.Dunford, ENDF-6 Format Manual, IAEA-NDS-76 * 00022 * * 00023 * Calling tree of the program * 00024 * * 00025 * 2 1 XNNEWS * 00026 * 3 1 XNTAB1 * 00027 * 4 1 XNMWRI * 00028 * 5 1 XNFIVE * 00029 * 6 2 XN5GTE * 00030 * 7 3 XNTAB1 * 00031 * 8 3 XNTAB2 * 00032 * 9 3 XNHLIN * 00033 * 10 3 XNTERP * 00034 * 11 4 XNBINS * 00035 * 12 4 XNTRPI * 00036 * 13 3 XNENGR * 00037 * 14 4 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00038 * 15 4 XNPOPE * 00039 * 16 3 XNORGR * 00040 * 17 2 XN5PRB * 00041 * 18 3 XNGTPB * 00042 * 19 4 XNLF01 * 00043 * 20 5 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00044 * 21 5 XNBINS * 00045 * 22 4 XNLF05 * 00046 * 23 5 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00047 * 24 4 XNLF07 * 00048 * 25 5 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00049 * 26 4 XNLF09 * 00050 * 27 5 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00051 * 28 4 XNLF11 * 00052 * 29 5 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00053 * 30 4 XNLF12 * 00054 * 31 5 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00055 * 32 2 XN5PER * 00056 * 33 3 XNPERC * 00057 * 34 1 XNSIX * 00058 * 35 2 XN6LOA * 00059 * 36 3 XNTAB1 * 00060 * 37 3 XNTAB2 * 00061 * 38 3 XNLIST * 00062 * 39 2 XN6CEG * 00063 * 40 2 XN6TLB * 00064 * 41 3 XN6TO5 * 00065 * 42 4 XN6PLB * 00066 * 43 5 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00067 * 44 5 XN6LA1 * 00068 * 45 6 XN6SSC * 00069 * 46 7 XN6LE1 * 00070 * 47 8 DASLGF * 00071 * 48 8 XNKAMA * 00072 * 49 8 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00073 * 50 7 XNTRPI * 00074 * 51 6 XNTRPI * 00075 * 52 6 XN6LE1 ===> 46 * 00076 * 53 5 XN6LA6 * 00077 * 54 5 XN6LA7 * 00078 * 55 6 XNTERP ===> 10 * 00079 * 56 6 XNTRPI * 00080 * 57 3 XN6INT * 00081 * 58 4 XN6TO5 ===> 41 * 00082 * 59 1 XNSUMM * 00083 * * 00084 ************************************************************************ 00085 #include "xcmxse.inc" 00086 #include "xcindx.inc" 00087 #include "xctab1.inc" 00088 #include "xcenes.inc" 00089 #include "xcmfh6.inc" 00090 * ---> File names 00091 CHARACTER*124 CHFINP, CHFOUT, CHLIST 00092 * ---> Isotope names 00093 CHARACTER*11 XNELNA, CHELNA 00094 dimension mindex(mxsect*ninden),addinf(nadinf) 00095 equivalence(lindex,mindex) 00096 * ---> Neutron mass in GeV 00097 parameter(hnmass=.93956563) 00098 DATA mathol / -99 / 00099 CHARACTER*(*) CHFORM 00100 #ifdef XSASCII 00101 parameter(chform='FORMATTED') 00102 #else 00103 parameter(chform='UNFORMATTED') 00104 #endif 00105 #include "xcnamf.inc" 00106 #include "xcseci.inc" 00107 * 00108 *----------------------------------------------------------------------- 00109 * 00110 * ---> Open input file (should come from FIXUP) 00111 WRITE(6,'(''Input file: '',$)') 00112 READ(5,'(A)') chfinp 00113 OPEN(12,file=chfinp(:index(chfinp,' ')-1), 00114 + status='OLD',action='READ') 00115 * ---> Open direct access output file 00116 WRITE(6,'(''Output file: '',$)') 00117 READ(5,'(A)') chfout 00118 OPEN(11,file=chfout(:index(chfout,' ')-1),form=chform, 00119 + access='DIRECT',recl=80,status='UNKNOWN') 00120 * ---> Open summary file 00121 WRITE(6,'(''Listing file: '',$)') 00122 READ(5,'(A)') chlist 00123 OPEN(15,file=chlist(:index(chlist,' ')-1),form='FORMATTED', 00124 + status='UNKNOWN') 00125 WRITE(15,'('' *** XNMAKE: from file '',A)') 00126 + chfinp(:index(chfinp,' ')-1) 00127 * ---> Set to 0 index counter 00128 nindex = 0 00129 * ---> Set to 1 record counter 00130 nrecw = 1 00131 * ---> Get to new ENDF-6 section 00132 10 CALL xnnews(c1, c2, l1, l2, n1, n2, math, mfh, mth) 00133 * ---> EoF? 00134 IF(math.LT.0) GOTO 70 00135 * ---> New material? 00136 IF(math.NE.mathol) THEN 00137 * ---> Get additional information on isomeric state 00138 READ(12,10200) elis,sta,lis,liso,izero,nfor 00139 mathol=math 00140 izamat = nint(c1) 00141 * ---> Print what we found 00142 chelna = xnelna(izamat*10+liso) 00143 WRITE(6,10000) chelna,math 00144 10000 FORMAT(' Now processing ',a,' mate ',i4) 00145 * ---> Find mass of isotope in GeV 00146 hmass = c2*hnmass 00147 * ---> Reset Q-values counter 00148 nqiv = 0 00149 ENDIF 00150 mfo=mfh 00151 * ---> In case of file 6 we call it file 5 in the index 00152 IF(mfo.EQ.6) mfo=5 00153 * ---> Combined reaction code 00154 ibmft=mfo*1000+mth 00155 * ---> Is this a reaction we want? 00156 DO 20 jindex=1,mxreac 00157 IF(mth.EQ.nbmft(jindex)) THEN 00158 jjth=jindex 00159 GOTO 30 00160 ENDIF 00161 20 CONTINUE 00162 GOTO 10 00163 * ---> Cross section or energy spectrum? 00164 30 CONTINUE 00165 DO 40 jmfil=1,maxmfi 00166 IF(mfo.EQ.lmfile(jmfil)) THEN 00167 GOTO 50 00168 ENDIF 00169 40 CONTINUE 00170 GOTO 10 00171 * ---> Store index entry 00172 50 nindex=nindex+1 00173 lindex(1,nindex) = izamat*10+liso 00174 lindex(2,nindex) = ibmft 00175 lindex(3,nindex) = nrecw+1 00176 * ---> Set to 0 additional information 00177 DO 60 jinf=1,nadinf 00178 addinf(jinf)=0.0 00179 60 CONTINUE 00180 IF(mfh.EQ.3) THEN 00181 * ---> This is a cross section 00182 * ---> Decode TAB1 structures 00183 CALL xntab1 00184 * ---> Elimintate duplicate energies 00185 CALL xndupl(xnrval,np,npout) 00186 IF(np.NE.npout) WRITE(6,10100) np-npout 00187 np=npout 00188 * ---> Store number of words = 2*points 00189 lindex(4,nindex) = 2*np 00190 * ---> Store QI value 00191 addinf(1) = c2 00192 IF(lepdis(jjth)) THEN 00193 * ---> Save QI for later use by file 6 routine, if any 00194 nqiv=nqiv+1 00195 IF(nqiv.GT.maxse6) stop 'Increase MAXSE6' 00196 qiv(nqiv)=c2 00197 mtqiv(nqiv)=mth 00198 ENDIF 00199 IF(mth.EQ.1) THEN 00200 * ---> If total Cross Section store atomic mass in GeV 00201 addinf(1) = hmass 00202 ENDIF 00203 * ---> Write information on direct access file 00204 CALL xnmwri(addinf,nadinf,xnrval,np*2,nrecw,math,mth,mfh) 00205 ELSEIF(mfh.EQ.5) THEN 00206 * ---> File 5 distribution 00207 IF(lepdis(jjth)) THEN 00208 * ---> Build integral table 00209 CALL xnfive 00210 addinf(1) = nperc 00211 * ---> NENS primary energies + (NPERC+1) secondary energies for each 00212 * primary one 00213 mtperc = (nperc+1+1)*nens 00214 lindex(4,nindex) = mtperc 00215 * ---> Write information on direct access file 00216 CALL xnmwri(addinf,nadinf,percen,mtperc,nrecw,math,mth,mfh) 00217 ENDIF 00218 ELSEIF(mfh.EQ.6) THEN 00219 * ---> File 6 distribution 00220 IF(lepdis(jjth)) THEN 00221 neutyi=nyield(jjth) 00222 * ---> Build integral table 00223 CALL xnsix 00224 addinf(1) = nperc 00225 * ---> NENS primary energies + (NPERC+1) secondary energies for each 00226 * primary one 00227 mtperc = (nperc+1+1)*nens 00228 lindex(4,nindex) = mtperc 00229 * ---> Write information on direct access file 00230 CALL xnmwri(addinf,nadinf,percen,mtperc,nrecw,math,mth,mfh) 00231 ENDIF 00232 ENDIF 00233 GOTO 10 00234 * ---> Write file index at the end, and pointer at the beginning 00235 #ifdef XSASCII 00236 70 WRITE(11,rec=1,fmt=10400) nindex*ninden, nrecw+1 00237 DO 80 j=1,(nindex*ninden-1)/8+1 00238 WRITE(11,rec=j+nrecw,fmt=10500) (mindex(l),l=8*(j-1)+1, 00239 + 8*j) 00240 80 CONTINUE 00241 #else 00242 70 WRITE(11,rec=1) nindex*ninden, nrecw+1 00243 DO 80 j=1,(nindex*ninden-1)/20+1 00244 WRITE(11,rec=j+nrecw) (mindex(l),l=20*(j-1)+1,20*j) 00245 80 CONTINUE 00246 #endif 00247 CLOSE(11) 00248 * ---> Write summary 00249 CALL xnsumm 00250 CLOSE(15) 00251 * 00252 10100 FORMAT(1x,i4,' duplicate energies removed') 00253 10200 FORMAT(2e11.4,4i11,i4,i2,i3) 00254 10300 FORMAT(6e11.4,i4,i2,i3,i5) 00255 10400 FORMAT(i10,10x,i10,50x) 00256 10500 FORMAT(8i10) 00257 END
